Harry Potter: I would choose Harry Potter because he is one of the most iconic and beloved characters in literature. He has a strong sense of loyalty and bravery, and he has overcome many obstacles to achieve great things.

Wonder Woman: I would choose Wonder Woman because she is a powerful and inspiring character who embodies strength, wisdom, and compassion. She has a unique ability to connect with people from all walks of life and to bring them together for the greater good.

Batman: I would choose Batman because he is a complex and multifaceted character who has faced many challenges throughout his life. He has a strong sense of justice and a deep commitment to protecting those who cannot protect themselves.

Hermione Granger: I would choose Hermione Granger because she is a brilliant and resourceful character who has a passion for learning and a deep understanding of the world around her. She has a strong sense of responsibility and a deep commitment to doing what is right.

Frozen Elsa: I would choose Frozen Elsa because she is a powerful and magical character who has faced many challenges throughout her life. She has a strong sense of self and a deep commitment to protecting those she cares about, and she has the ability to bring joy and wonder to those around her.
